Contact

Below you will find a directory of contacts for the City of Gold Bar.

Gold Bar City Hall Main Line: 360.793.1101
(Final Utility Requests please contact d.beaston@cityofgoldbar.us)
Mailing Address:  107 5th Street, Gold Bar WA 98251

Office Hours: Monday Thru Friday 8AM till 5PM, with Daily Closure From 12PM till 1PM!

For Building Permits/Mechanical Use Permits/ROW Permits or Land use questions please contact Office Manager Denise Beaston and/or Public Works Director Rich Norris. Please note that our office hours are Monday Thru Thursday, 8am to 5pm with closing daily from 12-1pm for lunch.

Please Note: Payments received after 4:45PM will be posted to next business day!

City of Gold Bar Mayor – Steve Yarbrough
Mayor Steve Yarbrough, Cell 425.238.2655

Public Works Director – Office Hours Monday – Thursday, 8am to 5pm
Rich Norris

Office Manager/Utility Billing Clerk/Violations Bureau Clerk/Animal Control/Code Enforcement/Emergency Management Coordinator – Office Hours Monday – Thursday, 8am to 5pm
Denise Beaston

Clerk Treasurer/Notary – Office Hours Tuesday – Friday, 8am to 5pm
Lisa Stowe

Public Records Officer (For Utility Billing and Building permit questions/requests contact Denise Beaston)
Public Records

Water Main Breaks Only – After Hours
Contact Water Manager Richard Baker, 425.238.1935 or Public Works Director Rich Norris, 425.238.4649

Water Quality Problems contact City Hall
Our office hours are Monday – Friday 8am – 5pm.
We are closed daily from 12pm – 1pm
After hours please contact Water Manager Richard Baker at 425.238.1935 or Public Works Director Rich Norris at 425.238.4649

Report Power Outages (SNO COUNTY PUD) Online Outage Reporting (click here)
Phone: Automated 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
425-783-1001 (toll-free at 1-877-783-1001)

Gold Bar Police Chief Carl Whalen – Snohomish County Sheriff’s
Email Address: Carl.Whalen@co.snohomish.wa.us

For all emergencies Call 911

For Non Emergencies Call 425.407.3999

Other
Building Official Tim Nordvedt

Civil:

Criminal: Snohomish County Prosecuting Attorney

Litigation: Keating Bucklin & McCormack, Inc., P.S.
